page.title: 10SEAFORD CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: { LEISURE ACTIVITIES}ARE VERY IMPORTANT TO RETIRED PEOPLE AND{MANY GROUPS {INCLUDE NUMBERS OF OLDER PEOPLE}WHO HAVE RETIRED HERE FROM OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY. { THE ART CLUB HOLDS}AN ANNUAL EXHIBITION OF OILS AND WATERCOLOURS BY LOCAL AMATEURS AT THE PRIMARY SCHOOL EVERY AUGUST.{THE DRAMATIC SOCIETY PRESENTS FOUR PLAYS EACH YEAR AT ITS NEWLY ENLARGED LITTLE THEATRE.{THE {OPERATIC SOCIETY}IS ALSO BUILDING A NEW THEATRE IN WHICH TO PERFORM MUSICAL SHOWS.{THE CHORAL SOCIETY}MEET REGULARLY IN THE PARISH CHURCH.{THE {MUSIC CLUB}AND A{FOLK DANCE GROUP}ARE {POPULAR. THE FLOWER CLUB}HOLDS FESTIVALS OF FLOWER ARRANGEMENT.{LOCAL {HISTORY, RAMBLING AND PET CLUBS}MEET. {THE YOUTH CLUB }MEETS AT ELM COURT AND SEVERAL CHURCHES HAVE THEIR OWN YOUTH GROUPS, AS WELL AS{SCOUTS AND GUIDES.
